product_name: Feedback Sports Fatt Rakk Bike Storage Rack
long_description: Providing a stable resting spot for your fat-tire steed, the Feedback Sports Fatt Rakk Bike Storage Rack is optimized for 3 - 5 in. wide bike tires. Rack features a spring-mounted arm to hold front or back wheel without touching spokes, rims or rear derailleur. Modular design supports multiple storage racks connected together. Adjust cones for best tire fit.
short_description: Providing a stable resting spot for your fat-tire steed, the Feedback Sports Fatt Rakk Bike Storage Rack is optimized for 3 - 5 in. wide bike tires.
